summary: Email correspondence between legal professionals discussing technical aspects of Jeffrey Epstein's communication systems, specifically the MindSpring network and Citrix program used by Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The email includes clipped testimony excerpts about the setup and use of these systems within Epstein's organization.

persons.name: Sandra Perkins
persons.context: Listed as a recipient in the email chain discussing Epstein's communication systems.

persons.name: Peter Skinner
persons.context: Listed as a recipient in the email chain discussing Epstein's communication systems.

persons.name: Mark Lumber
persons.context: Identified in testimony as the computer guy who worked only for Jeffrey Epstein and set up the MindSpring system at the Palm Beach house from New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure whose organization used MindSpring and Citrix for communication among employees, houses, and friends.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as being within Epstein's organization and using the same communication systems.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Her contact information appears in the email footer, indicating the law firm involved in the correspondence.

connections.description: Mark Lumber worked exclusively for Jeffrey Epstein as a computer technician, setting up the MindSpring communication system.
Both were part of the same organization using the MindSpring/Citrix communication systems.
Both were recipients of the same email discussing legal and technical aspects of the Epstein case.

events.title: Testimony on Epstein's Communication Systems
events.description: Testimony excerpts discuss the setup and use of MindSpring and Citrix programs within Jeffrey Epstein's organization for internal communication.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's organization used a MindSpring network and Citrix program for communication among employees, houses, and friends.
Mark Lumber, a computer technician from New York who worked exclusively for Epstein, set up the MindSpring system at the Palm Beach house.
The email correspondence includes clipped testimony discussing the technical infrastructure of Epstein's operations.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as part of Epstein's organization using the same communication systems.
